definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: This will launch XCOR into the emerging space tourism market, estimated at over a half-billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 公司将投资超过五亿美金，来拓展空间旅游市场。

sentences.english: Yule . he owned a lot of land in the area, but was selling none of it.
sentences.chinese: 他在该美金汇率趋势拥有大量的土地，却概不外卖。

sentences.english: he pays, I think, about two thousand dollars a month.
A nine-week course at Singularity University will cost $25,000.
sentences.chinese: 奇点大学为期九周的课程将花费25000美金。

sentences.english: You'll have to pay a deposit of $60 to reserve the room.
sentences.chinese: 要预定这个房间，你需交付60美金的押金。

sentences.english: Allen bought the team in 1988 for $70 million.
sentences.chinese: 1988年阿伦花了7000万美金买下球队。

sentences.english: Monthly donate US$50 for a term of three years.
sentences.chinese: 每月捐助美金五十元，三年为期。

sentences.english: The company had $5.4bn of cash at the end of the second quarter.
sentences.chinese: 在第二季度末，联合科技现金流有54亿美金。

sentences.english: Repairing your car will cost a minimum of 100 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 修你的汽车最少要花100美金。

sentences.english: The man at the desk gives you each two thousand dollars, cash.
sentences.chinese: 桌子后面的男人给了你们一人两千美金，现金。

sentences.english: Like for one year of martial arts, it costs about five hundred dollars.
sentences.chinese: 一年的武术课程要花上500美金。

sentences.english: Ambac’s stock traded at $96 three years ago.
The bank statement says that I have fifty dollars in my account.
sentences.chinese: 银行结算单显示，我账户里还有五十美金。

sentences.english: It went up for auction in Finland and was sold for US$43,000.
sentences.chinese: 他在芬兰被放上拍卖，以美金四万三卖出。

sentences.english: But you need to come up with $6 a month for the premium games.
sentences.chinese: 但是你需要每个月花美金6元来使用这些游戏。
